author: Gordon K
title: Accuweather Forecasts a Big Chill
text:
If Accuweather's forecast is correct, some nasty weather is heading this way. We have high standards here at Twitchy and, as such, we can't editorialize too much without risking running afoul of the aforementioned standards. With that in mind, we will let the Tweets speak for themselves.
Widespread travel problems will unfold and bitterly cold air will follow in many areas.â€” AccuWeather (@accuweather)
[https://t.co/p6g1cZyaze] [pic.twitter.com/HDLVLBMatf] [January 2, 2025]
MUST.NOT.MAKE.JOKE.
I...um...â€” Amy Curtis ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡± (@RantyAmyCurtis)
Yeah.
We all see it.
[https://t.co/oK4KblZdwQ] [January 2, 2025]
And now, y'all can't unsee it.
If your winter weather lasts longer than 1,500 miles, then you should probably see a specialist.â€” Quintus Septimius Florens Tertullianus (@mwilliams433)

Severe weather has been known to paralyze travel. Fortunately, we have the right guy for the job.

No, friend. Today we're all thirteen years old.
Who wants to be the one putting a needle in that after 4 hours?â€” Rick Robinson #MAGA/MAHA2024 (@RowdyRick73)

Oh boy, it's going to be a long winter, some might say nippy. OK, we're out.
